#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std ;
int n ;
long long a[100002] , q1 , q2 , q3, q4 ;
long long kadane ( ) {
    long long max_sum = -999999999, cur_max = 0 ;
    for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ ) {
        if ( a[i] != q1 && a[i] != q2 && a[i] != q3 && a[i] != q4 ) {
            cur_max = max ( cur_max + a[i] , a[i] ) ;

            max_sum = max ( max_sum , cur_max ) ;
        }
        else if ( cur_max < 0 ) {
            cur_max = 0 ;
        }
        else
            cur_max = 0 ;
    }
    return max_sum ;
}
int main () {
    int  t ;
    scanf ( "%d" , &t ) ;
    while ( t-- ) {
        scanf ( "%d %lld %lld %lld %lld" , &n , &q1, &q2 , &q3 , &q4 ) ;
        for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ ) {
            scanf ( "%lld" , &a[i] ) ;
        }
        printf ( "%lld\n" , kadane() ) ;
    }
    return 0 ;
}
